attributes.action: To change every banks rules and polic
attributes.background: To change every banks rules and policy to one where if they close your account without reason, they have to disclose it if you are not able to appeal to reverse their actions

rejection.details:
Banks are required to give 2 months notice in writing, in most circumstances, to close a personal bank account. You can find more information here: https://www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk/businesses/complaints-deal/banking-and-payments/bank-account-closures

If you would like to make a complaint to the Financial Ombudsman Service, you can do so here: https://www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk/consumers/how-to-complain
